title.narrative: 2.4.PREVENTION,DETECTION&RESPONSE TO VAC

description.narrative: Output 2.4: By the end of 2021, the health, education and social welfare systems have stronger capacities for prevention, early detection, and response to child maltreatment in at least three provinces., which contributes to Child Protection â€“ Strengthen Families And Communities, Promotion Of Care, Mental Health And Psychosocial Well-Being And Justice, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect, Protection From Violence, Exploitation, Abuse And Neglect (Covid), Violence, Exploitation And Abuse. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement, Community Engagement, Social And Behaviour Change, Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 2: By the end of 2021, disadvantaged children and adolescents have improved access to quality education and benefit from social services and judicial proceedings which promote their best interests

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Output 2.4: By the end of 2021, the health, education and social welfare systems have stronger capacities for prevention, earlydetection, and response to child maltreatment in at least three provinces.

description.narrative: In 2021, UNICEF-supported multi-sectoral policy note on prevention, early detection and response to child maltreatment was finalized and approved by the involved governmental partners. The document provides a foundation for the key stakeholders to adopt a coordinated, cross- sectoral approach towards prevention of child maltreatment.;; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:04/01/2022

title.narrative: Availability of a comprehensive report including findings of a) a situation analysis on child maltreatment b) a mapping of key stakeholders and existing systems/services for prevention, early detection and response to child maltreatment in three target provinces.(46674)

actual.value: 2019:The Sit.An/mapping has been completed, and the report is available.

title.narrative: A draft strategy for national scale-up of the programme for prevention, early detection and response to child maltreatment is developed.(46767), Text
A programme for prevention, early detection and response to child maltreatment is developed and adopted by MoH and MoE for implementation in four priority provinces.(46765), Text

target.value: 2022:Yes ( Multi-stakeholder policy note on child maltreatment adopted by key stakeholders.)
